QtoSetDef.Name: Qto_StairFlightBaseQuantities
QtoSetDef.Definition: Base quantities that are common to the definition of all occurrences of stair flights.

QtoDef.Name: Length
QtoDef.Definition: Total length of the stair flight along the walking line.

DefinitionAliases.DefinitionAlias: Gesamtlänge des Treppenlaufs gemessen entlang der Lauflinie des Treppenlaufs.

QtoDef.Name: GrossVolume
QtoDef.Definition: Total gross volume of the stair flight. Openings, recesses, and projections are not taken into account.

DefinitionAliases.DefinitionAlias: Gesamtes Bruttovolumen des Treppenlaufs. Alle Öffnungen werden übermessen.

QtoDef.Name: NetVolume
QtoDef.Definition: Total net volume of the stair flight. Openings and recesses are taken into account by subtraction, projections by addition.

DefinitionAliases.DefinitionAlias: Gesamtes Nettovolumen des Treppenlaufs. Alle Öffnungen werden abgezogen.

QtoDefinitionAliases.QtoDefinitionAlias: Basismengen für alle Bauelemente vom Typ Treppenlauf.
